hero.title: Security
hero.subtitle: Zero-Trust security is not a feature. It's our architecture.

intro.title: We Can't Access Your Servers
intro.subtitle: Most platforms store your SSH keys and "promise" not to look. We took a different approach: we literally cannot access your servers. Here's how.
intro.zeroTrustExplainer: Imagine even if someone has the key to your house, you verify their identity at every interior door. ServerFlow never trusts by default: every command must be signed and verified, and no connection is allowed from outside to your server.

ed25519.title: Ed25519 Cryptographic Signatures
ed25519.description: Every command sent through ServerFlow is cryptographically signed using Ed25519, the same elliptic curve cryptography used by Signal, OpenSSH, and TLS 1.3. This mathematically guarantees that commands cannot be forged or tampered with.

outbound.title: Outbound-Only Connections
outbound.description: The ServerFlow agent on your server initiates all connections to our orchestrator. We never connect to your server.
points: No SSH keys to manage or leak
No open ports required on your firewall
No way for us to access your server directly

zeroStorage.title: No Server Access Keys
zeroStorage.description: We never store SSH keys or root passwords. Service credentials (MySQL, Redis) are generated locally on your server and transit encrypted once to your dashboard. We cannot use them to access your machines.

openSource.title: Open Source Agent
openSource.description: Our agent is 100% open source. You can audit every line of code that runs on your server. We encourage security researchers to review our code.

dataPrivacy.title: Data Privacy
dataPrivacy.description: ServerFlow processes deployment commands, logs, and service connection strings (displayed once in your dashboard). We never access your application code, database contents, or user data. All transmissions are encrypted with TLS 1.3.

diagram.title: How It Works
diagram.details: NO SSH â€¢ NO OPEN PORTS â€¢ YOUR DATA STAYS YOURS

infoBox.defaultText: Hover over the diagram elements to understand our Zero-Trust architecture and the security protocols used (Ed25519, TLS 1.3).
infoBox.vpsText: The ServerFlow agent is a sentinel. It uses the Ed25519 cryptographic standard to prove its identity. Unlike traditional methods, your private keys NEVER leave your server.
infoBox.sfText: Our platform acts as a secure command center. It never "enters" your home. It prepares signed instructions that only your agent can decrypt and execute via a TLS 1.3 tunnel (the highest current standard).
infoBox.pipeText: The "pipe" is a persistent outbound connection. The agent initiates contact. This guarantees that no hacker can scan or attack open ports on your server: there are none.

subprocessors.title: 6. Sub-processors
subprocessors.intro: The Controller provides general authorization for the Processor to engage Sub-processors. Current Sub-processors include:
subprocessors.notice: The Processor shall inform the Controller of any intended changes to Sub-processors, giving the Controller the opportunity to object.

transfers.title: 7. International Transfers
transfers.content: When Personal Data is transferred outside the European Economic Area, the Processor shall ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, including Standard Contractual Clauses.

rights.title: 8. Data Subject Rights
rights.content: The Processor shall assist the Controller in fulfilling its obligation to respond to requests from data subjects exercising their rights under GDPR.

breach.title: 9. Data Breach Notification
breach.intro: The Processor shall notify the Controller without undue delay upon becoming aware of a personal data breach. Such notification shall include:
items: Description of the nature of the breach
Categories and approximate number of data subjects affected
Measures taken or proposed to address the breach

audit.title: 10. Audit Rights
audit.content: The Controller may conduct audits to verify compliance with this DPA. The Processor shall cooperate with such audits and provide access to relevant documentation.

termination.title: 11. Term and Termination
termination.content: This DPA shall remain in effect for the duration of the Agreement. Upon termination, the Processor shall delete all Personal Data within 30 days unless retention is required by law.

gdprPage.title: GDPR Compliance
gdprPage.subtitle: Your data privacy is our priority.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to GDPR
commitment.content: ServerFlow is fully committed to complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We have implemented comprehensive measures to ensure that your personal data is processed lawfully, fairly, and transparently.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.content: ServerFlow Inc. acts as the data controller for personal data collected through our services. For any GDPR-related inquiries, please contact our Data Protection Officer at

rights.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
rights.intro: As a data subject, you have the following rights:

items.name: Right to Access
items.description: Request a copy of your personal data

items.name: Right to Erasure
items.description: Request deletion of your personal data

items.name: Right to Restrict Processing
items.description: Limit how we use your data

items.name: Right to Data Portability
items.description: Receive your data in a portable format

items.name: Right to Object
items.description: Object to processing based on legitimate interests

lawfulBasis.title: Lawful Basis for Processing
lawfulBasis.intro: We process personal data based on the following lawful bases:

items.name: Contract Performance
items.description: To provide our services to you

notCollect.title: Data We Don't Collect
notCollect.intro: Due to our Zero-Trust architecture, we never have access to:

transfers.title: International Data Transfers
transfers.content: Our servers are located in the European Union. When data is transferred outside the EU, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, such as Standard Contractual Clauses.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected. Account data is deleted within 30 days of account closure.

protection.title: Data Protection Measures
items: End-to-end encryption for data in transit (TLS 1.3)
Encryption at rest for stored data
Regular security audits and penetration testing

exercising.title: Exercising Your Rights
exercising.content: To exercise any of your GDPR rights, please contact us at
exercising.response: We will respond to your request within 30 days.

authority.title: Supervisory Authority
authority.content: If you believe your data protection rights have been violated, you have the right to lodge a complaint with your local supervisory authority.
